description: Cody stopped over Toney's house the other day. He wanted to welcome him to the neighborhood. Cody always does something special for the newest neighbor, especially if that new neighbor is hot with a bangin' body. Cody rang the bell and when Toney answered, Cody went right into straight boy slayer mode. He knows how to flip 'em and he flips them well. Watch and you might learn some of his secrets.
title: Boning Toney
